name: PongChamp
description:
PongChamp Description:

PongChamp is a game where you fight against a World Champion (Basically an AI)

While playing, there will be Upgrades that spawn randomly inside the arena. While you're on it, Collect  "Nerfs" that weaken the world champion

[Controls]
  • W / up arrow = up 
  • D / down arrow = down
  • Esc / M = Menu
